content: black cat garland 1 of 5 love + stitch co black cat garland © 2020 love+stitch co all rights reserved black cat garland 2 of 5 click the links below to reach out we hope you enjoy making this black cat garland we would love to see your creations and share them so be sure to hashtag #loveandstitchco or tag @loveandstitchco on instagram instagram etsy email lovecrafts facebook ravelry © 2020 love+stitch co all rights reserved black cat garland 3 of 5 each cat motif is approximately 3 inches wide stats yarn paintbox yarns cotton aran in materials a - black 1 x 50g / 93yds b - seville orange 1 x 50g / 93yds hook 4 00mm us size g-6 other tapestry needle stitch marker small amount of cream color yarn to embroider eyes and nose this pattern can be made with any sport or worsted weight yarn the size of motifs may vary depending on the size of hook and yarn used this pattern uses us terminology terminology magic_ring magic_ring chain chain st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet increase increase double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet dtr double treble_crochet repeat the steps in f/o fasten_off brackets total no of sts per round © 2020 love+stitch co all rights reserved black cat garland 4 of 5 1 each cat motif is worked separately and later joined notes together to form a garland 2 the amount of yarn listed in materials is approximately for 6 motifs 3 if you don t want to make a garland you can easily use the individual cat motifs as hanging decorations gift toppers or even coasters cat motif using the color a black yarn begin with an magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 2 3 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st x 2 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase x 3 3 single_crochet increase x 3 2 single_crochet 18 round 4 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet x 3 3 single_crochet increase single_crochet x 3 1 single_crochet 24 round 5 3 single_crochet increase single_crochet x 3 6 single_crochet increase single_crochet x 3 3 single_crochet 30 round 6 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet x 3 9 single_crochet increase single_crochet x 3 5 single_crochet 36 we will crochet the cat s ears in the next two rounds round 7 5 single_crochet increase single_crochet x 3 12 single_crochet increase single_crochet x 3 1hdc 1dc in next st 1tr 1dtr 1tr in next st 1dc 1hdc in next st 1 single_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next 3 sts round 8 slip_stitch in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet 1hdc 1dc in next st 1tr 1dtr 1tr in next st 1dc 1hdc in next st 1 single_crochet slip_stitch into next st f/o and weave in the end using the color b seville orange yarn chain 25 joining round 1 join to the cat s ear with a slip_stitch at the top of dtr crochet chain 20 join to the other ear
